Introduction:

Hi. My name is Alistair and I am passionate and self-motivated to take on the challenge of becoming a software and web developer. Through comprehensive online courses, I have laid a strong foundation of knowledge and am eager to use it to launch myself into a professional career, where I can continue to grow and learn under the guidance of seasoned professionals.

Everything I have learnt has been taught through online courses like Codecademy's Full stack enginner course, or through my own self study.

SKILLS ðŸ¤“

Using HTML as the skeleton of my web pages, I have been able to build a strong comprehension of the language and how to use it to meet my needs. I able to use HTML in a sematic way, along with deploying the use of different tags to lay the foundation of a well structured website.

I am proficient in the language CSS. I thoroughly enjoy transforming static HTML into a sleek and professional design that will improve the user experiance, using features like flexbox and grid to create interesting layouts which can be responsive and effective.

Creating interactive websites using JavaScript is exreamaly rewarding when it functions and enhances the websites performance. I have used the language to create a fantastic user experiance for example, using DOM manipulation to modify the structure and style of the web page, allowing for me to dynamically alter the content and appearance of a webpage.

Github has been a fantastic tool to use that has allowed me to test and deploy different websites. I have created repositories that have allowed me to implement the knowledge that I have soaked up through my studies and use it practically.

I have used Git throughout most of my projects, using it to commit changes that I have made to my work and test changes on different branches of my project. Additionally, I have used Git to review the status of my work and comment on the changes that I will be implementing into my software.

THREE.js is an incrediable tool that I have absolutly loved to use. It strongly motivetes me when I can conbine enthusiasm for 3D modeling and web development to level up my websites.

First Portfolio :

This was my first attempt at a Portfolio. It was a great learning experiance for me which pushed me outside of my comfort zone allowing me to learn the key essential skill that a web deveopler requires. Moreover, it forced me to use my problem solving skills so that I could fix errors and work towards an end goal that I was happy with.

About Me ðŸ”Ž

Who Am I :

I am someone who has a massive interest in tech and a even greater passion for creating interesting and new software. I decided to put all of my effort and time into changing job sectors and become a web developer/software developer. I want to follow this path as I know I have the potential to achieve great things if I put my mind to it and I have the motivation to do so.

Interests:

Gaming ðŸŽ®

Playing games is how I relax, it's where I could lose hours of time being lost in a world that had be crafted by a passionate daveloper who had a vision of what they wanted to create and brought it to life. My favourite types of games are the ones that challenge you, where you have to "Get good" If you want any chance of beating it. Some worthy mentions are CS2, Elden Ring, CupHead, Noita and Sifu. These games have easily taken up hundereds of hours of my time where I have been enthralled by the idea of beating them and am willing to take on the challange.

Coding ðŸ’»

Coding started off as a hobby for a while so that could just have fun and be creative with friends. After a while I decided that it is what I want to do for a career, so I started the Full-Stack Egineer course at Codecademy to make that wish a reality. I have been soaking up knowledge where ever I can to make me better and better everyday. I know that is a very competative environment but I am driven and motivated to make coding a career for myself and be proud in what I do.

Books ðŸ“š

Books are an escape, they can transport me to very distant worlds. Something about reading a good book is very comforting, it washes away any worries or stess that you may be experiancing at the time. Some books that have absolutly blown my mind are Red Rising, Project Hail Mairy and The Way of Kings I recommend these to anyone who enjoys Sci-Fi / Fantasy.
